original: sgra chen pos rnam par 'phrul pa'i klu'i sngags mi 'tshal na bka' drin chen pos bshad du gsol //
analyzed: sgra chen pos rnam par 'phrul pa'i klu'i sngags mi 'tshal na bka' drin chen pos bshad du gsol //
translated: If you do not need the mantra of the nāga who emanated as Mahādeva, please explain it out of great kindness.

original: bka' stsal pa /🔽sngags kyi rgyal po chen po'i mtshan nyid skal ba chen po'i lha mo nyon cig /
analyzed: bka' stsal pa / sngags kyi rgyal po chen po'i mtshan nyid skal ba chen po'i lha mo nyon cig /
translated: He replied:🔽Listen, goddess of great fortune, to the characteristics of the great king of mantras.

original: gshin rje mche ba can ma nyid //
analyzed: gshin rje mche ba can ma nyid //
translated: Yama's fang

original: rus sbal gyi ni stan la bzhugs //
analyzed: rus sbal gyi ni stan la bzhugs //
translated: Sits on a tortoise seat.

original: dbu ma yi ni tha ma nyid //
analyzed: dbu ma yi ni tha ma nyid //
translated: The last of the middle

original: slar yang bzhi pa la gnas pa //
analyzed: slar yang bzhi pa la gnas pa //
translated: Again, abiding in the fourth,

original: gshin rje'i phyogs kyi mthar gnas pa //
analyzed: gshin rje'i phyogs kyi mthar gnas pa //
translated: Dwelling at the end of Yama's direction,

original: bzang po yis ni steng du brgyan //
analyzed: bzang po yis ni steng du brgyan //
translated: Adorned above with the good one.

original: slar @352a *// yang gshin rje'i mche ba can //
analyzed: slar @352a *// yang gshin rje'i mche ba can //
translated: Again, Yama's fang

original: rus sbal gyis ni rab tu brgyan //
analyzed: rus sbal gyis ni rab tu brgyan //
translated: Adorned with a tortoise.

original: aom bha zhes bya'i tshig dang ldan //
analyzed: aom bha zhes bya'i tshig dang ldan //
translated: The word Om Bha,

original: dang po ru ni rus sbal gyi //
analyzed: dang po ru ni rus sbal gyi //
translated: First, the tortoise seat,🔽The Lord, the painting,

original: stan bzhugs mgon po ri mo dang // rtses brgyan lan gnyis bsgyur bar bya //
analyzed: stan bzhugs mgon po ri mo dang // rtses brgyan lan gnyis bsgyur bar bya //
translated: Adorned with the crest, should be repeated twice.

original: mgon po phan phan tshig gis brgyan //
analyzed: mgon po phan phan tshig gis brgyan //
translated: The Lord, adorned with the beneficial words,

original: ka ki mu khi /
analyzed: ka ki mu khi /
translated: Kakimukhi,

original: mu ka ke si /🔽na ga gi /
analyzed: mu ka ke si / na ga gi /
translated: Mukakesi,🔽Nagagi,

original: ai ndhu bha ga gi /
analyzed: ai ndhu bha ga gi /
translated: Indhubhagagi,

original: ko ti sadzdzi /
analyzed: ko ti sadzdzi /
translated: Kotisajji,

original: bi hi ba di hi /
analyzed: bi hi ba di hi /
translated: Vihivadhi,

original: aa pa ri'o si'o //
analyzed: aa pa ri'o si'o //
translated: Apariso,

original: ka ha ka ha dzdza'i /
analyzed: ka ha ka ha dzdza'i /
translated: Kaha kaha jji,

original: kasma da tham/ dza'i ainda bha mi bid thu ma he sa ro pa tsa kkhe bi sarba ba la bo ha no bi ho bi na sa nta ha na se'i /
analyzed: kasma da tham/ dza'i ainda bha mi bid thu ma he sa ro pa tsa kkhe bi sarba ba la bo ha no bi ho bi na sa nta ha na se'i /
translated: Kasmattham, jaindabhami vidhuram mahesaropachakhebisarva balabohanobihosanasantam hanase,

original: ka ki hi ya ya pa ri san tham yam zhes /
analyzed: ka ki hi ya ya pa ri san tham yam zhes /
translated: Kakih yayayaparisantham yam.

original: mkha' 'gro kun dang mnyam sbyor ba'i //
analyzed: mkha' 'gro kun dang mnyam sbyor ba'i //
translated: The union of all dakinis,

original: rdo rje mkha' 'gro bde ba'i mchog /
analyzed: rdo rje mkha' 'gro bde ba'i mchog /
translated: The vajra dakini, supreme bliss,

original: rdo rje sems dpa' de bzhin gshegs //
analyzed: rdo rje sems dpa' de bzhin gshegs //
translated: Vajrasattva, the Tathagata,

original: bcom ldan rdo rje can gyis gsungs //
analyzed: bcom ldan rdo rje can gyis gsungs //
translated: Was spoken by the Blessed One, the vajra holder.

original: dbugs byed pa ni sa dbang phyug /
analyzed: dbugs byed pa ni sa dbang phyug /
translated: The breath is the lord of the earth,

original: zla ba'i dum bus brgyan pa ste //
analyzed: zla ba'i dum bus brgyan pa ste //
translated: Adorned with a crescent moon,

original: slar yang dbu ma'i dbu ma gzung //
analyzed: slar yang dbu ma'i dbu ma gzung //
translated: Again, the middle of the middle is held to be the navel.

original: byang phyogs kyi ni dbu ma yi //
analyzed: byang phyogs kyi ni dbu ma yi //
translated: The middle of the north

original: zhabs kyi padma nyi mar ldan //🔽bden bral la ni sme bas brgyan //
analyzed: zhabs kyi padma nyi mar ldan // bden bral la ni sme bas brgyan //
translated: is the lotus of the feet, endowed with the sun.🔽The one adorned with moles in the southwest

original: 'bar ba 'bugs pas rnam par klubs //
analyzed: 'bar ba 'bugs pas rnam par klubs //
translated: is covered with the blazing cave.🔽The first of the north,

original: byang phyogs kyi ni dang po dang / khyu mchog steng na gnas pa yi //
analyzed: byang phyogs kyi ni dang po dang / khyu mchog steng na gnas pa yi //
translated: and the one who resides on the back of the bull,🔽residing at the end of the direction of Yama,

original: gshin rje phyogs kyi mthar gnas dang // rlung ni yugs sa mo yis brgyan //
analyzed: gshin rje phyogs kyi mthar gnas dang // rlung ni yugs sa mo yis brgyan //
translated: is adorned with the barren woman of the wind.

original: bden bral la ni gnas pa yi //
analyzed: bden bral la ni gnas pa yi //
translated: The one who resides in the southwest

original: gshin rje yi ni mche ba can //🔽gti mug rgyan gyis rnam par brgyan //
analyzed: gshin rje yi ni mche ba can // gti mug rgyan gyis rnam par brgyan //
translated: is the one with the fangs of Yama.🔽Adorned with the ornament of delusion,

original: gshin rje 'joms ma gti mug klubs //
analyzed: gshin rje 'joms ma gti mug klubs //
translated: Yamadāntā is covered with delusion.

original: klu yi phyag rgya @352b 'di yis ni //
analyzed: klu yi phyag rgya @352b 'di yis ni //
translated: By this mudrā of the nāgas,

original: mkha' 'gro ma kun dga' mgur 'gyur //
analyzed: mkha' 'gro ma kun dga' mgur 'gyur //
translated: all the dakinis will be delighted.

original: sgyu 'phrul chen po bcu drug 'di //
analyzed: sgyu 'phrul chen po bcu drug 'di //
translated: This great magic of the sixteen

original: yi ge re rer kun gnas zhes //
analyzed: yi ge re rer kun gnas zhes //
translated: abides in each syllable.

original: mkha' 'gro kun dang mnyam sbyor ba'i //
analyzed: mkha' 'gro kun dang mnyam sbyor ba'i //
translated: The dakini who is united with all dakinis

original: mkha' 'gro ma ni bde ba'i mchog /
analyzed: mkha' 'gro ma ni bde ba'i mchog /
translated: is the supreme bliss of the dakinis.

original: rdo rje sems dpa' de bzhin gshegs //
analyzed: rdo rje sems dpa' de bzhin gshegs //
translated: Vajrasattva, the tathāgata,

original: bcom ldan rdo rje can gyis gsungs //
analyzed: bcom ldan rdo rje can gyis gsungs //
translated: The Blessed One, the Vajra Holder, has taught.

analyzed: rig pa'i rgyal po'i zhal du bcug la ji srid mi snang bar gyur pa de srid du bzlas par bya'o //

original: sbrul gyi rgyal po rnyed pa dang / ri mo dkar nag du ma bu so sor phye la dkar nag so sor shes par byas pa de dang / shangka pushpa dang / aa ga ru nag po la stong phrag nyi shu rtsa bzhir gcig gis ma tshang ba'i sngags bzlas la /

translated: One should find the king of snakes, and having separated the white and black stripes, one should know the white and black [parts] individually. One should recite the mantra twenty-four thousand times with a śaṅkha flower and black aloe wood, short by one.

original: phyis kyang brgyad brgya bzlas te bdug par bya'o //
analyzed: phyis kyang brgyad brgya bzlas te bdug par bya'o //
translated: Later, one should recite the mantra eight hundred times and make an offering.

original: skar ma rgyal gsum la snam bu byas te zla ba yar do la dum bu dkar pos bdug go /
analyzed: skar ma rgyal gsum la snam bu byas te zla ba yar do la dum bu dkar pos bdug go /
translated: One should make a cloth under the three victorious stars, and on the waxing moon one should make an offering with white pieces.

original: mar do la ni /
analyzed: mar do la ni /
translated: On the waning moon,

original: dum bu nag pos bdug go /
analyzed: dum bu nag pos bdug go /

original: de nas de gyon pa'i lus kyis lan khri bzlas na 'grub par 'gyur te /
analyzed: de nas de gyon pa'i lus kyis lan khri bzlas na 'grub par 'gyur te /
translated: Then, having recited ten thousand times with the body clothed in that [cloth], one will succeed.

original: dkar po dang nag po'i phyogs la so sor gyon pas mi snang bar 'gyur ro //
analyzed: dkar po dang nag po'i phyogs la so sor gyon pas mi snang bar 'gyur ro //

original: gang du 'gro bar 'dod pa der 'gro bar 'gyur zhing gang la 'dod pa de la 'dod pa spyod par 'gyur ro //
analyzed: gang du 'gro bar 'dod pa der 'gro bar 'gyur zhing gang la 'dod pa de la 'dod pa spyod par 'gyur ro //

original: de'i kha'i bu gar lig bu mig bcug ste du ba med par bsregs la /
analyzed: de'i kha'i bu gar lig bu mig bcug ste du ba med par bsregs la /

original: de tshig pa dang mtshan mo zhib mor btags te mig la byugs na /
analyzed: de tshig pa dang mtshan mo zhib mor btags te mig la byugs na /

original: khyim gyi me tog mchog ltar gsal la rang gi lha'i sngags bzlas na mi mthong bar 'gyur ro //🔽lto 'phye'i rgyal po sa bum mam /
analyzed: khyim gyi me tog mchog ltar gsal la rang gi lha'i sngags bzlas na mi mthong bar 'gyur ro // lto 'phye'i rgyal po sa bum mam /
translated: Like the supreme flower of the house, it will be clear, and if one recites one's deity's mantra, one will become invisible.🔽Place the king of earthworms in an earthen pot

original: kham por gyi nang du bcug ste gter du sbas la /
analyzed: kham por gyi nang du bcug ste gter du sbas la /

original: de nas rul zhing zags pa dang bton te /
analyzed: de nas rul zhing zags pa dang bton te /
translated: and then, when it has rotted and leaked, take it out.

original: de'i thod pa'i rus ba brdar te thig ler byas na /
analyzed: de'i thod pa'i rus ba brdar te thig ler byas na /
translated: Grind its skull bone and make it into a pill.

original: grib ma yang med par byed do //
analyzed: grib ma yang med par byed do //
translated: It will remove even the shadow.🔽With the earth

original: de zags pa'i sas @354a *//
analyzed: de zags pa'i sas @354a *//
translated: of its leakage,

original: lus la byugs na /
analyzed: lus la byugs na /
translated: smear it on the body.

original: dug sna tshogs zhi bar byed do //
analyzed: dug sna tshogs zhi bar byed do //
translated: It will pacify various poisons.🔽One whose dust always smells sweet, whose hair curls to the right, who is pleasing, who has seven shadows, whose body is without wounds, who speaks the truth,

original: gang gi rdul gyi dri rtag tu zhim zhing skra g-yas su 'khyil pa dang / yid du 'ong zhing grib ma bdun dang ldan la lus la rma med cing bden par smra ba dang / yun ring du mig mi 'dzum pa de ni /
analyzed: gang gi rdul gyi dri rtag tu zhim zhing skra g-yas su 'khyil pa dang / yid du 'ong zhing grib ma bdun dang ldan la lus la rma med cing bden par smra ba dang / yun ring du mig mi 'dzum pa de ni /
translated: and who does not blink for a long time,

original: lha mo dngos grub byed par 'gyur te /
analyzed: lha mo dngos grub byed par 'gyur te /
translated: She is the goddess who grants accomplishments.

original: gzhan yang kha'i dbugs dri zhim zhing rtag tu skyid de bar gnas pa de ni /
analyzed: gzhan yang kha'i dbugs dri zhim zhing rtag tu skyid de bar gnas pa de ni /
translated: Moreover, she is always happy, with breath that smells sweet.🔽She is the one who, like the bodhisattvas, always gives great gifts.

original: byang chub sems dpa' rnams ltar sbyin pa chen po rtag tu gtong bas sgrub pa po rnams bskyab pa'i phyir mi ro'i gzugs kyis gnas te /
analyzed: byang chub sems dpa' rnams ltar sbyin pa chen po rtag tu gtong bas sgrub pa po rnams bskyab pa'i phyir mi ro'i gzugs kyis gnas te /
translated: In order to protect the practitioners, she abides in the form of a corpse.

original: sems can rnams byin gyis brlab pa'i phyir sangs rgyas sh'akya thub pa mya ngan las 'das pa'i gzugs ltar phan par nye bar gnas pa mdun du bdar ba dang yang dag par ldan pa yin no //
analyzed: sems can rnams byin gyis brlab pa'i phyir sangs rgyas sh'akya thub pa mya ngan las 'das pa'i gzugs ltar phan par nye bar gnas pa mdun du bdar ba dang yang dag par ldan pa yin no //
translated: In order to bless sentient beings, she is like the form of Buddha Śākyamuni in parinirvāṇa, abiding in order to benefit.

original: lha mo de ni /
analyzed: lha mo de ni /
translated: That goddess

original: dngos grub kyi yon tan thams cad kyi 'byung gnas su gyur pas lce spyang dang / bya rgod pa dang / bya rog la sogs pa sha zan thams cad kyis kyang bskor te gnas la /
analyzed: dngos grub kyi yon tan thams cad kyi 'byung gnas su gyur pas lce spyang dang / bya rgod pa dang / bya rog la sogs pa sha zan thams cad kyis kyang bskor te gnas la /
translated: is surrounded by all the flesh-eating creatures, such as jackals, vultures, crows, and so on, because she is the source of all the qualities of accomplishments.

original: yang dbang po'i tshul gyis gzugs de la gnod sbyin dang / srin po dang / lha dang / yi dags la sogs pas kun nas bskor te gnas pa sgrub pa po shin tu mnyam par bzhag pas cho ga de ltar shes par byas nas de'i snying kha na ro tsa na yod pa blangs te rang gi snying po bzlas pas thig le byas na /
analyzed: yang dbang po'i tshul gyis gzugs de la gnod sbyin dang / srin po dang / lha dang / yi dags la sogs pas kun nas bskor te gnas pa sgrub pa po shin tu mnyam par bzhag pas cho ga de ltar shes par byas nas de'i snying kha na ro tsa na yod pa blangs te rang gi snying po bzlas pas thig le byas na /
translated: Again, by the method of the sense organs, that form is surrounded by yakṣas, rākṣasas, gods, pretas, and so on. The adept, having understood that rite through being very well equipoised, takes the lac that is in their heart and makes a bindu on his heart with the recitation of his essence.

original: steng du dpag @354b tshad bye ba stong phrag gi bar 'gro zhing slar yang 'ong la /
analyzed: steng du dpag @354b tshad bye ba stong phrag gi bar 'gro zhing slar yang 'ong la /
translated: He will go above, up to a million leagues, and return again.

original: rdzu 'phrul dang / cho 'phrul sna tshogs mthong zhing mkha' 'gro ma rnams dang dga' mgur rtse zhing rnal 'byor thams cad rnyed par 'gyur ro //
analyzed: rdzu 'phrul dang / cho 'phrul sna tshogs mthong zhing mkha' 'gro ma rnams dang dga' mgur rtse zhing rnal 'byor thams cad rnyed par 'gyur ro //
translated: He will see various miracles and wonders, and will enjoy himself with the ḍākinīs, and will obtain all the yogas.

original: de'i sha zos pa tsam gyis khams gsum gyi ye shes can du 'gyur zhing /
analyzed: de'i sha zos pa tsam gyis khams gsum gyi ye shes can du 'gyur zhing /
translated: By merely eating their flesh, he will become a wisdom being of the three realms.

original: rlung gi shugs kyis dpag tshad brgyar 'gro la lha'i lus can du 'gyur te /
analyzed: rlung gi shugs kyis dpag tshad brgyar 'gro la lha'i lus can du 'gyur te /

analyzed: gang dang gang 'dod pa de dang de ster bar 'gyur ro //

original: nam mkha' lding dang / byi la dang / 'ug pa'i zhag la mi ro'i ras kyis sdong bu byas te me mar btang na /
analyzed: nam mkha' lding dang / byi la dang / 'ug pa'i zhag la mi ro'i ras kyis sdong bu byas te me mar btang na /

analyzed: gter thams cad mthong bar 'gyur zhing sha za dang / 'byung po gang dag yi ba pa de dag thams cad mthong bar 'gyur ro zhes /

original: dbu ma'i gnyis pa bzung nas su //
analyzed: dbu ma'i gnyis pa bzung nas su //
translated: Having taken the second of the central [nādī],

original: slar yang nub kyi dang po can //
analyzed: slar yang nub kyi dang po can //

original: sum cu lnga pa brgyan par bzhed //
